title: Coronavirus: Holby City donates ventilators to London Nightingale hospital
description: The BBC medical drama donated the ventilators to help "the courageous and selfless real-life medics".

title: Coronavirus: What can the UK learn from Germany on testing?
description: The UK's chief medical adviser says there's "a lot to learn" from Germany, so what has it been doing?

title: Coronavirus: how to choose your lockdown playlist
description: Music can help to ease and anxiety and create a routine in lockdown, a music therapist says.

title: Coronavirus: How GPs have stopped seeing most patients in person
description: The move to online appointments is a huge change as data shows fewer than 1% were done this way last year

title: Coronavirus: Virus deepens struggle for migrants
description: Migrants in Calais and the UK say the Covid-19 pandemic is deepening the struggles they face.

title: Rare Ravi Shankar footage released to mark centenary
description: Archive images show the celebrated Indian musician alongside the Queen and George Harrison.

title: Coronavirus: 'Deadly resurgence' if curbs lifted too early, WHO warns
description: Countries should be cautious about lifting lockdown measures, the World Health Organization says.

title: Coronavirus: 'My parents' campervan has become my office'
description: A marketing manager explains why she turned a campervan into her office during coronavirus.

title: Kenny Dalglish tests positive for coronavirus
description: Liverpool legend Sir Kenny Dalglish tests positive for coronavirus and is in hospital.

title: Coronavirus: Why some US churches are still open this Easter
description: The battle rages on over the right to gather in houses of worship as most Americans remain confined.

title: Coronavirus: The UK's Easter lockdown from above
description: Many areas in the UK seem to be following the government advice, with relatively empty beaches and parks .

title: Coronavirus: Public reassured over lockdown policing rules
description: No 10 says people can buy what they like from shops which remain open - and use their gardens as they wish.

title: 'Test all players before English season restarts'
description: LMA chief executive Richard Bevan tells BBC Sport that football should not restart again in England until all players are tested for coronavirus.

title: Jimmy Greaves: Tottenham record scorer remains in hospital but has not had stroke
description: Tottenham say their record goalscorer Jimmy Greaves remains in hospital but "has not tested positive for Covid-19 nor suffered another stroke".

title: Celtic announce salary reductions & deferrals
description: Celtic's first-team squad and manager Neil Lennon are among those taking a voluntary and "significant reduction" in salaries.

title: Coronavirus: New York ramps up mass burials amid outbreak
description: Drone footage shows coffins stacked in a pit in the city, as the state logs more cases than any country.

title: Six Barcelona board members quit and question club's direction
description: Six Barcelona board members resign and tell president Josep Maria Bartomeu they are unhappy at how the club is being managed.

title: Poetry power: BBC correspondents read their favourites (part two)
description: Listen to some BBC correspondents sharing the poems that have helped them through difficult moments.

title: Coronavirus: NHS doctor who pleaded for PPE dies
description: Abdul Mabud Chowdhury, 53, made the appeal on Facebook five days before he was admitted to hospital.

title: Coronavirus: Google data suggests park visits rose on weekend
description: Warm weather saw an increase in park visits last weekend, but overall activity was lower than usual.

title: Royal Mail is 'putting profits before safety' say staff
description: Postal workers say they are not being given adequate protection from coronavirus risk.

title: Norman Hunter: Leeds United legend in hospital with coronavirus
description: Ex-England and Leeds United defender Norman Hunter is being treated in hospital after testing positive for coronavirus.

title: Can my dog or cat catch coronavirus?
description: Can pets contract the virus and if so can they spread it to other animals or to humans?

title: 'Powers that be' intervene to postpone UFC 249
description: UFC president Dana White says he was told to "stand down" from holding UFC 249 on 18 April, with the event now postponed.

title: Coronavirus: Teachers in Singapore stop using Zoom after 'lewd' incidents
description: A secondary school home-based geography lesson in Singapore was hijacked by two men.

title: Linkin Park: New Chester Bennington music 'did my friend justice'
description: His vocals, recorded more than 20 years ago, appear on a new album by his former band Grey Daze.

title: Coronavirus pandemic: EU agrees €500bn rescue package
description: EU ministers reached the deal after long talks, pledging support for countries hit hard by coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus tests and masks sold by fraudsters online
description: A BBC investigation has found online scams selling fake protective equipment and coronavirus tests.

title: Cadet Rated Legend album: Krept on his cousin's life and legacy
description: Krept reflects on Cadet's life and legacy more than a year since his death, as his debut album is released.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: 'The most urgent research race in living memory'
description: Dr John Wright says "we are running for our lives" as we search to find a treatment for Covid-19.

title: Coronavirus: Sick children hospital treatment 'hit' during pandemic - leaked email
description: Children with illnesses unrelated to Covid-19 could be coming to harm, NHS official's leaked email says.
